events.name: Evolution of LiB Production Network
events.wd_description: The evolution of the lithium-ion battery (LiB) production network requires an approach capturing the interaction and political-economic organization across existing supply chains. The Global Production Network (GPN) approach provides a more holistic understanding of these dynamics.
events.description: The evolution of the lithium-ion battery (LiB) production network requires an approach capturing the interaction and political-economic organization across existing supply chains. The Global Production Network (GPN) approach provides a more holistic understanding of these dynamics.

events.name: GPN approach
events.wd_description: The GPN approach is a relational method to understand the organization of economic activities, addressing the fragmented and dispersed nature of economic structures.
events.description: The GPN approach is a relational method to understand the organization of economic activities, addressing the fragmented and dispersed nature of economic structures.

events.name: Organizational platforms
events.wd_description: Organizational platforms enable actors in different economies to compete and cooperate for value creation, transformation, and capture through dispersed economic activities.
events.description: Organizational platforms enable actors in different economies to compete and cooperate for value creation, transformation, and capture through dispersed economic activities.

events.name: graphic extensification
events.wd_description: GPN focuses on the relationship between the geographic spread of economic activities and their organizational integration and coordination.
events.description: GPN focuses on the relationship between the geographic spread of economic activities and their organizational integration and coordination.

events.name: Battery mineral supply GPN
events.wd_description: The battery mineral supply is situated within a GPN extending downstream through battery manufacturing to end-use applications, focusing on actors, networks, and activities shaping its geographies.
events.description: The battery mineral supply is situated within a GPN extending downstream through battery manufacturing to end-use applications, focusing on actors, networks, and activities shaping its geographies.

events.name: Economic abd non economic actors
events.wd_description: The GPN identifies the economic and non-economic actors, interrelations, and multiple locations constituting the network, including the state as a multifaceted actor.
events.description: The GPN identifies the economic and non-economic actors, interrelations, and multiple locations constituting the network, including the state as a multifaceted actor.

events.name: Firm strategies
events.wd_description: The GPN approach focuses on different firm strategies of innovation, cooperation, and competition, giving the network its dynamic character.
events.description: The GPN approach focuses on different firm strategies of innovation, cooperation, and competition, giving the network its dynamic character.

events.name: Inter-industry intersections
events.wd_description: The GPN approach demonstrates the importance of inter-industry intersections, driving the organizational, material, and geographical forms of battery production.
events.description: The GPN approach demonstrates the importance of inter-industry intersections, driving the organizational, material, and geographical forms of battery production.

events.name: GPN in battery sector
events.wd_description: The GPN approach in the battery sector considers the organization of production from mineral extraction to end-uses in energy storage, intersecting with automotive and power sectors.
events.description: The GPN approach in the battery sector considers the organization of production from mineral extraction to end-uses in energy storage, intersecting with automotive and power sectors.

events.name: Upstream implications
events.wd_description: The GPN approach examines upstream implications of battery manufacturing, focusing on supply and demand dynamics in mineral raw materials.
events.description: The GPN approach examines upstream implications of battery manufacturing, focusing on supply and demand dynamics in mineral raw materials.

events.name: Downstream implications
events.wd_description: Downstream implications include demand from battery applications in electric mobility, with strategies for reuse, recycling, and circular business models.
events.description: Downstream implications include demand from battery applications in electric mobility, with strategies for reuse, recycling, and circular business models.

events.name: State role
events.wd_description: The state plays multiple roles in the GPN, including facilitating market growth, regulating investment and trade, and acting as a buyer.
events.description: The state plays multiple roles in the GPN, including facilitating market growth, regulating investment and trade, and acting as a buyer.

events.name: Organisational Platforms
events.description: Organisational platforms through which actors in different regional and national economies compete and cooperate for value creation, transformation, and capture through geographically dispersed economic activity.

events.name: Geographic Extensification
events.description: Relationship between the geographic extensification of economic activities and their organizational integration and coordination.

events.name: Gigafactory Deployment
events.description: Growth of battery gigafactories driven by automotive demand, highlighting regional concentration and strategic national developments.
